//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "tweedledum", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "8 - Run" );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/civ/english/fmale/thosemen.mp3" );

	task ( "flee" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "fleespot" );
	}

	dowait ( "flee" );
}
